markdown:
| icon           = poe2_cloak_Ruata_Walking_Cloak_icon.png
| description    = Ruata was born into the Roparu caste of her tribe. Fostered by laborers, she was taught that her life of hard work would be but a prelude to her next life of duty, respect, and responsibility. All the same, she was not so content to wait.

Ruata set out from her tribe and wandered the isles, taking but a single possession - her cloak. She lived off the land and hunted when able, growing in her acclaim as a tribeless curiosity and storyteller. She made friends and enemies in great abundance with nary a regret, for her path was always before her. Ruata's fate is unknown, but her name is often whispered among the Roparu, who learned to believe that not all paths are predetermined.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Cape
